duties_responsibilities.duty: Calibrate, maintain, and track status of electronic equipment for military applications.
Provide technical and procedural advice and guidance concerning metrology related matters.
Provide in-depth technical advice in metrology calibration disciplines.
Operate, maintain, troubleshoot, repair, and calibrate electronic Inspection, Measuring and Test Equipment (IM&TE).
Troubleshoot Test and Monitoring System (TAMS) and reference calibration standards by making measurements with test equipment.
Analyze engineering drawings and provide technical and administrative supervision of calibration and repair technicians.
Basic electronic construction and repair skills including soldering and wiring.

education_certification.credential: Successful completion of a military Precision Measurement and Calibration Program or equivalent training from an accredited U.S. Navy or U.S. Marine Corps school. Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field.
